query: Write a Python example that defines a custom FunctionTool with ToolContext, adds it to an LlmAgent, and shows the agent configuration (no execution).
Provide Python code that configures MCPToolset with SseConnectionParams and attaches it to an LlmAgent (do not call the tool).
Give a Python example of a SequentialAgent that passes state using output_key between two LlmAgents.
Write Python code for a LoopAgent that uses a custom BaseAgent stop checker with EventActions(escalate=...) and two LlmAgents.
keywords: from google.adk.agents import LoopAgent, LlmAgent, BaseAgent

query: Show Python code that uses AgentTool to wrap a sub-agent and attach it to a parent LlmAgent.
Provide a Python example of LlmAgent with input_schema and output_schema using Pydantic BaseModel (no tool calls).
Write Python code for a custom FunctionTool that accesses tool_context.state and returns a dict, then add it to an LlmAgent.
Give a Python example that creates a ParallelAgent with two LlmAgent sub-agents (no execution).
Provide Python code showing a custom BaseAgent subclass that reads ctx.session.state and yields an Event without running any LLM.
Write Python code that builds an LlmAgent with a ToolContext-aware FunctionTool and a description field (no execution).
